main event: On 27 June 1952 in Bronx, New York, Mrs. [REDACTED] and other witnesses observed a disc-shaped object hovering, then flying towards downtown Manhattan at a terrific speed before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as a thick, silver-gray, disc-shaped object about the size of a target range.
The sighting occurred early in the morning on the roof of an apartment building.
The object was observed hovering, rotating, and then standing up in mid-air before zooming towards downtown Manhattan.
The witnesses included Mrs. [REDACTED], her husband, two children, and a neighbor.
The event was reported to Captain Nausman and included a brief description given by Mrs. [REDACTED] as well as other witnesses.
No photographs were present in the report.
witnesses: Mrs. [REDACTED], her husband, two children, and a neighbor
